member.name: T:System.Numerics.BigIntegerExtender
member.summary: Extends BigInteger to support the calculation of square roots.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BigIntegerExtender.Sqrt(System.Numerics.BigInteger)
member.summary: Returns the square root of a specified number.
member.remarks: An extension method for BigInteger that use Newton's method.
member.param: The BigInteger object whose square root is to be found.

member.name: T:System.Numerics.BigIntegerSerializable
member.summary: A wrapper for BigInteger to support serialization.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BigIntegerSerializable.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the current instance and a specified object have the same value.
member.remarks: If the obj parameter is not a BigIntegerSerializable value, but it is a data type for which an implicit conversion is defined, the Equals(Object) method converts obj to a BigIntegerSerializable value before it performs the comparison.
member.returns: true if the obj parameter is a BigIntegerSerializable object or a type capable of implicit conversion to a BigIntegerSerializable value, and its value is equal to the value of the current BigIntegerSerializable object; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BigIntegerSerializable.System#IEquatable{System#Numerics#BigIntegerSerializable}#Equals(System.Numerics.BigIntegerSerializable)
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the current instance and a specified BigIntegerSerializable object have the same value.
member.remarks: This method implements the IEquatable interface and performs slightly better than Equals(Object) because it does not have to convert the other parameter to a BigIntegerSerializable object.
member.returns: true if this BigIntegerSerializable object and other have the same value; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BigIntegerSerializable.op_Equality(System.Numerics.BigIntegerSerializable,System.Numerics.BigIntegerSerializable)
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the values of two BigIntegerSerializable objects are equal.
member.remarks: Languages that do not support custom operators can call the BigIntegerSerializable.Equals(BigIntegerSerializable) instance method instead.
member.returns: true if the left and right parameters have the same value; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BigIntegerSerializable.op_Inequality(System.Numerics.BigIntegerSerializable,System.Numerics.BigIntegerSerializable)
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether two BigIntegerSerializable objects have different values.
member.remarks: Languages that do not support custom operators can call the BigIntegerSerializable.Equals(BigIntegerSerializable) method and reversing its value.
member.returns: true if the left and right parameters have different values; otherwise, true.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BigIntegerSerializable.op_Implicit(System.Numerics.BigIntegerSerializable)~System.Numerics.BigInteger
member.summary: Defines an explicit conversion of a BigIntegerSerializable object to a BigInteger object.
member.param: The value to convert to a BigInteger object.
member.returns: An object that contains the value of the value parameter.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BigIntegerSerializable.op_Implicit(System.Numerics.BigInteger)~System.Numerics.BigIntegerSerializable
member.summary: Defines an explicit conversion of a BigInteger object to a BigIntegerSerializable object.
member.param: The value to convert to a BigIntegerSerializable object.
member.returns: An object that contains the value of the value parameter.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BigIntegerSerializable.System#Xml#Serialization#IXmlSerializable#ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Generates a BigIntegerSerializable object from its XML representation.
member.param: The XmlReader stream from which the object is deserialized.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BigIntegerSerializable.System#Xml#Serialization#IXmlSerializable#WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)
member.summary: Converts a BigIntegerSerializable object into its XML representation.
member.param: The XmlWriter stream to which the object is serialized.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BigIntegerSerializable.GetHashCode
member.summary: Returns the hash code for the current BigIntegerSerializable object.

member.name: M:System.Numerics.BigIntegerSerializable.ToString
member.summary: Converts the numeric value of the current BigIntegerSerializable object to its equivalent string representation.
member.returns: The string representation of the current BigIntegerSerializable value.
